div.p: Greetings. I am sending to you the speech that was delivered at the Imperial Diet by Mr. Charles de Marillac, Archbishop of Vienne, a pious envoy of the king. When I receive the conditions of peace, I will send them to the most honorable council, to whom I wish all things beneficial and happy, as well as to Mr. Martyr and Gwalther.
